title: Classic Collar Bones
description: Sturdy silver collar bones designed specifically for our semi cutaway collar - the perfect accessory to keep collars looking tip-top.

title: Clip Braces
description: Our braces are made in the UK and feature clip fastenings and one and half inch wide elasticated braces. Perfect for a complete Pink look.

title: Classic Cotton Socks
description: A pair of classic men's socks, suitable for any outfit.

title: Thomas Pink Signature Scarf
description: Tie up your chilly day attire with the luxurious Thomas Pink Signature Scarf. With added cashmere and a minimalist design, this scarf will be heading straight for centre stage in your cold weather wardrobe.

title: Woven Pocket Square
description: Our luxuriously soft silk gentleman's pocket square. A true dash of clasic flair from Thomas Pink.

title: Berrington Stripe Pyjama Bottoms
description: The Berrington Stripe Pyjama Bottoms will provide you with superior comfort for days when relaxation is your top priority. Crafted in cotton, they feature a PINK stamped waistband and our cheeky fox logo. The Berrington Pyjama Bottoms are the perfect accompaniment to our Chiswick Undershirt, completing the ultimate cosy ensemble.

title: Mother of Pearl Silver Button Cufflinks
description: The Mother of Pearls Button cufflinks dress up any shirt with its circular shape and grey detailing. Made from solid sterling silver, a classic essential that can be paired with almost any shirt.

title: Classic Plain Cuff Knots
description: The reliable classic; our cuff knots are lightweight and easy to insert. The elasticised connector allows you to slide your hands through your cuff without fiddling with the typical solid cufflink.

title: Knightley Check Tie
description: Add a modern touch to your everyday wardrobe with our Knightley Check Tie. Woven in 100% Silk and exceptionally finished in the United Kingdom, our ties are guaranteed to be the final flourish to any business outfit.

title: Elephant Repeat Print Tie
description: Add a touch of liveliness to your outfit with the Elephant Repeat Print Tie and keep your look firmly in season. Featuring a unique, playful motif this tie will add a touch of fun to your professional weekday wardrobe. Team it with a variety of different shirting designs for long-lasting splendour.

title: Single Plain Cotton Handkerchief
description: No gentleman should ever be without a handkerchief. The single plain cotton handkerchief features a contemporary bold and discreet Pink logo on border.

title: Sargin Flower Woven Tie
description: Add a touch of floral flamboyance to your outfit with the Sargin Flower Woven Tie and keep your look firmly in season. With a unique, playful giraffe motif this tie will add a touch of fun to your professional weekday wardrobe. Team it with a variety of different shirt for long-lasting splendour.

title: Velvet 'Ready To Wear' Bow Tie
description: Traditionally made bow tie, ready to wear for when time is of the essence. Luxurious velvet material combined with adjustable length.

title: Velvet 'Ready To Wear' Bow Tie
description: Traditionally made bow tie, ready to wear for when time is of the essence. Luxurious velvet material combined with adjustable length.

title: Frederick Plain Slim Fit Button Cuff Shirt
description: Easy to wear shirts that look and feel great, are Thomas Pink's heartland. With shirting patterns drawn from our Jermyn Street heritage and fabricated in two-fold 100s cotton poplin, they have a handle on quality and attention to detail that sets them apart.

title: Olav Spot Bow Tie
description: Enhance your seasonal sartorial style with the Olav Spot Bow Tie. Featuring a sophisticated spot design and crafted in 100% silk, this bow tie is a versatile addition to any gent's wardrobe.

title: Freddie Plain Super Slim Fit Button Cuff Shirt
description: The super slim fit is the most contemporary shirt shape in the range. Tailored cut with slimmer chest, the Freddie Stretch Super Slim Fit Button Cuff Shirt shirt features a short point collar, button cuffs, inverted back seam and darts for shaping. Crafted in a cotton stretch fabric, the Freddie shirt is designed for customers who want a close fitting and comfortable shirt. Neatly finished with signature 'Pink' detailing on the last button and under collar, stamping your on-duty style with modern polish.

title: Todd Skinny Tie
description: The Todd Skinny tie features a crisscross design pattern in contrasting colours which gives the piece depth and texture. A classic look with a modern cut.

title: Bartonly Check Slim Fit Button Cuff Shirt
description: The Travellers are shirts designed for the man on the go. With a unique easy care finish that minimises the need for ironing and a permanent crease on the sleeves, you will step off the plane looking as sharp as when you took off. These are our most technical shirts, also featuring an innovative finish that when washed maintains a 'box fresh' appearance on the collar and cuffs, providing you with an ever refined look.

title: Placket Evening Classic Fit Double Cuff Shirt
description: An elegant evening shirt made from the finest cotton poplin and finished with a neat hidden placket. The Placket Evening Classic Fit shirt is fashioned with all the care and passion you would expect from Thomas Pink, a truly modern classic fit. With double cuffs, a hand crafted semi cutaway collar and signature 'Pink' thread on the last button, the Placket Evening shirt offers plenty of detail. It is generously cut for superior comfort.

title: Shelton Stripe Slim Fit Button Cuff Shirt
description: Inspired by our very first shirts, the 1984 features fine Italian two-fold 100s cotton and is proudly made in the United Kingdom. The Shelton Stripe Slim Fit Button Cuff Shirt features a semi-cutaway collar, button cuffs and your choice of regular or long sleeve lengths, and is completed with signature Pink thread on the last button. A luxurious business shirt for the discerning gentleman who favours a comfortable fit.

title: Shelton Stripe Slim Fit Button Cuff Shirt
description: Inspired by our very first shirts, the 1984 features fine Italian two-fold 100s cotton and is proudly made in the United Kingdom. title: Leyton Check Slim Fit Button Cuff Shirt
description: Choose a Pink business shirt for a clean and crisp executive look, crafted out of the finest materials, Pink shirts are built to last.

title: Conduit Stripe Athletic Fit Button Cuff Shirt
description: For the athletic guy, fit can be a problem. The broad shoulders and narrow waist that come with working out can cause issues when it comes to finding a shirt. Thomas Pink addresses this challenge with the Athletic Fit shirt, a slim shirt in stretch cotton specifically designed to accommodate the combination of muscular shoulders and narrow waist.

title: Hawley Crew Neck Jumper
description: High quality jumpers are essential for seasonal layering and the Hawley Crew Neck Jumper provides this versatility. The jumper is constructed from a luxurious 100% merino wool blend, making it the perfect casual choice for chilly spring days whilst remaining lightweight and wearable- ideal for layering over shirts or under jackets.

title: Hawley Crew Neck Jumper
description: High quality jumpers are essential for seasonal layering and the Hawley Crew Neck Jumper provides this versatility. The jumper is constructed from a luxurious 100% merino wool blend, making it the perfect casual choice for chilly spring days whilst remaining lightweight and wearable- ideal for layering over shirts or under jackets.

title: Derwent Oxford Slim Fit Button Cuff Shirt
description: Easy to wear shirts that look and feel great, are Thomas Pink's heartland. With shirting patterns drawn from our Jermyn Street heritage and fabricated in two-fold 100s cotton, they have a handle on quality and attention to detail that sets them apart. The Derwent Oxford Slim Fit Button Cuff Shirt has been created in a smart oxford cotton and is finished with a hand crafted semi cutaway collar and button cuffs. Beautifully finished in the United Kingdom with signature 'Pink' detailing, the Derwent shirt is sure to become a staple to your on-duty wardrobe. It is tailored but not tight.

The Clyde Oxford Slim Fit Button Cuff Shirt has been created in a smart oxford cotton and is finished with a hand crafted semi cutaway collar, button cuffs and seasonal under collar trims. Beautifully finished in the United Kingdom with signature 'Pink' detailing, the Clyde shirt is sure to become a staple to your on-duty wardrobe. It is tailored but not tight.

title: Ash Stripe Linen Slim Fit Button Cuff Shirt
description: A modern, slim fit linen shirt is the perfect summer go to, and the Ash Stripe Linen shirt is an effortless choice. These linen shirts are created in premium quality European Flax from the finest Italian mill, and will last for years to come. Cut on a formal block, the Ash stripe linen shirt features a contemporary stripe that can be worn to an occasion as easily as it can be for a weekend away. Pair it with a pair of smart chinos for a stylish off duty look. The Ash has been exceptionally finished in the United Kingdom with button cuffs and a classic semi-cutaway collar.

title: Ash Stripe Linen Slim Fit Button Cuff Shirt
description: A modern, slim fit linen shirt is the perfect summer go to, and the Ash Stripe Linen shirt is an effortless choice. title: Albert Suit Jacket
description: The Albert Jacket is a classically considered silhouette constructed from 100% wool which features a more traditionally inspired proportion. Internally the jacket has a signature Pink satin insert, triangle, ticket pocket and pink security button and the lining is highlighted by the use of our signature herringbone self-colour jacquard at the side panel.

title: Burford Suit Jacket
description: The Burford Suit Jacket is a versatile everyday piece which features our most tailored fit, the Belgravia. The suit is constructed from the highest quality wool from Lora Piana and produced in Italy with a natural stretch. The jacket features horn buttons and follows a classic two-button construction with two side pockets, notch lapel and double back vent, with the interior featuring a further two pockets, pen pocket and signature Pink label.

title: Hamilton Suit Jacket
description: The Hamilton Suit Jacket is a versatile everyday piece which features our most tailored fit, the Belgravia. The suit is constructed from the highest quality wool from Lora Piana and produced in Italy with a natural stretch. The jacket features horn buttons and follows a classic two-button construction with two side pockets, notch lapel and double back vent, with the interior featuring a further two pockets, pen pocket and signature Pink label.

title: Hamilton Suit Trouser
description: The Hamilton Suit Trousers are a versatile everyday piece which features our most tailored fit, the Belgravia. The suit is constructed from the highest quality wool from Lora Piana and produced in Italy with a natural stretch. The tapered trousers have been designed with half slant pockets, horn buttons and adjustable waistband detailing. The Hamilton Suit Trousers will offer comfortable sartorial style, marry up the look with the Hamilton Suit Jacket.

title: CF CLARENCE TROUSER
Hale Jacket
description: The Hale Jacket is an ideal everyday edition to your seasonal rotation. Produced in Italy using a canvassed construction in a charcoal melange all-season Italian hopsack. The Hale follows a classic single-breasted style with 2 horn buttons and two exterior pockets, as well as signature pink colour trims and lining. This jacket is sure to add a versatile elegance to your everyday wardrobe.

title: Clarence Jacket
description: The Clarence Jacket is a classically considered silhouette constructed from 100% wool which features a more traditionally inspired proportion. Internally the jacket has a signature Pink satin insert, triangle, ticket pocket and pink security button and the lining is highlighted by the use of our signature herringbone self-colour jacquard at the side panel.

title: Freddie Plain Super Slim Fit Button Cuff Shirt
description: The super slim fit is the most contemporary shirt shape in the range. Tailored cut with slimmer chest, the Freddie Stretch Super Slim Fit Button Cuff Shirt shirt features a short point collar, button cuffs, inverted back seam and darts for shaping. Crafted in a cotton stretch fabric, the Freddie shirt is designed for customers who want a close fitting and comfortable shirt. title: Dorlan Jacket
description: The Dorlan Jacket is a graphic interpretation of the classic herringbone jacket. The cloth is a blue grey tonal herringbone which is produced in a trans-seasonal wool and cotton blend. The construction follows a two button fastening with two side pockets, notch lapel and single back vent. The Dorlan Jacket can be easily paired with a variety of different trouser and chino options for the perfect sophisticated look.

title: Mersey Plain Linen Slim Fit Button Cuff Shirt
description: A modern, slim fit linen shirt is the perfect summer go to, and the Mersey Linen shirt is an effortless choice. These linen shirts are created in premium quality European Flax from the finest Italian mill, and will last for years to come. Cut on a formal block, the Mersey shirt can be worn to an occasion as easily as it can be for a weekend away. Pair it with a pair of smart chinos for a stylish off duty look. The Mersey has been exceptionally finished in the United Kingdom with button cuffs and a classic semi-cutaway collar.

title: Arlington Jacket
description: The Arlington Jacket provides a seasonal dash of colour with a rich tonal melange check pattern with red and blue accents. The jacket is fabricated in Lora Piana cloth and follows a classic construction with two button fastening, two side pockets, notch lapel and single back vent. The Arlington Jacket can be easily paired with a variety of different trouser and chino options for the perfect sophisticated look.

title: Christoffer Jacket
description: The Christoffer Jacket is a great all-season versatile jacket constructed from a soft wool and linen blend. The Christoffer provides a perfect base dressed up or down and is unlined with a soft construction to allow seasonal versatility.
